metadata.title: CVE-2024-5528 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions prior to16.11.6, starting from 17.0 prior to 17.0.4, and starting from 17.1 priorto 17.1.2, which allows a subdomain takeover in GitLab Pages.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
